about_the_game:
Short version of the game, where the player will be able to experiment the main game fighting mechanics and deckbuilding.

The rogue like (or full version) of the game will allow the player to travel thought the Megabattle universe and explore planets and make choices in each run that will be important to know the history and build the best possible robot to defeat the game villain, Megabot.

The game still contain a few bugs and a lot of improvements are necessary. With this demo we expect to understand what are the best game mechanics and which are the mechanics that we need to improve, balance or remove. The player feedback is encouraged and necessary.

Thanks for playing our demo.
